intro: Crossout Legends is a legendary MMO action game.
description:
Build your own unique combat vehicle in an easy-to-use constructor. Jump into 6v6 team PvP battles in a ruthless post-apocalyptic world or take on waves of AI opponents in PvE missions. Fight under the flags of post-apocalyptic factions and they will reward you with new parts and special abilities!

GAME FEATURES:
*** PLAY AS A TEAM: 6v6 online PvP shooter. Ruthless post-apocalyptic battles will determine who is the strongest!
*** BUILD YOUR UNIQUE VEHICLE: a heavy armoured vehicle, a nimble buggy, or a versatile pickup truck — create a machine that suits your play style. Change weapons, install equipment, choose intimidating decorations, and increase your chances of survival. 100+ parts and millions of combinations! Experiment with the craziest ideas. Arm yourself with machine guns, rocket launchers, chainsaws, mines, blasters, anything you can imagine! 
*** UNIQUE DAMAGE SYSTEM: shoot off any part of your enemy’s vehicle to immobilize them or leave them defenseless! Take your enemies apart in dynamic action! 
*** HUGE SELECTION OF WEAPONS: machine guns, rocket launchers, large-caliber cannons, and even miniguns! Choose the weapons that suit your style, for melee or long-range combat. 
*** FACTIONS: Engineers, Nomads, and more. Each faction has its own story in the post-apocalyptic world of Crossout. Choose the group that best suits your fighting style, take on their banner and they will reward you with unique parts for your combat vehicle. 
*** GORGEOUS GRAPHICS: spectacular effects, breathtaking landscapes, and a post-apocalyptic atmosphere! Enjoy the spectacular elements of each game map, the carefully detailed models of each combat vehicle, impressive explosions and flying debris.
*** BE THE FIRST: battle real players from around the world for the title of the bravest hero of the post-apocalypse! Want to play with friends? Add them to your group. Want more? Create your own clan or join an existing one to fight alongside your companions in ranked battles and participate in tournaments with rewards! Coordinate your strategy and destroy your enemies together!
